about_the_game:
Pastel provides players with psychological fear of underwater or above-water objects.

Players explore a blue space that is both beautiful and terrifying, looking for ways to survive.

Sometimes you'll have to solve puzzles to clear your way, and sometimes you'll have to fight creepy creatures.

You can enjoy the story by reading past logs scattered around the world.

Inspired by submechanophobia and liminal space.

The Demo version allows you to try out the tutorial level.
